overview: Far up the east coast of Greenland, a young aspiring hunter, 23-year-old Martin Madsen, still uses his sled dogs for hunting seals and polar bears as they have always done in his family. But times are changing in Greenland and the sled dogs are slowly dying out. From his remote village Ittoqqortoormiit, Martin asks himself what the future holds for him and his dogs.
title: The Hunter
